name: The Necromancer Cometh!
description:
The Necromancer Cometh is a mazing tower defense game with deckbuilding mechanics and a dark-but-playful fantasy theme.

In The Necromancer Cometh there are no predefined paths or preset tower build spots. Instead, build your towers wherever you like and make your own path!



  • Where you place your tower is just as important as what tower you build! Build a maze which maximizes the effectiveness of each tower!
  • Progress through an epic campaign of hand crafted levels!
  • Each tower has a unique ability that you must utilize in order to win! Unlock dozens of towers as you play! Mix and match their unique abilities to deal maximum damage!
  • Build your deck between levels to craft the perfect defense!
  • Each enemy has a unique ability that you must counter in order to beat the level! Defend against waves of enemies and mini bosses!
  • Unlock infinite mode and see how long you can last!
  • Enjoy the dark-but-playful fantasy theme with a fun ska-inspired soundtrack!

Can you survive when The Necromancer Cometh??
